title: Is Strategy Stock the Preferred Hedge Against Crypto Losses? Tom Lee Thinks So
contentSnippet: Strategy’s 650,000 BTC holdings make it a ‘pressure valve’ for the broader market, said the Bitmine Immersion chairman.

title: 'Liquidity Crisis': $12B in DeFi Liquidity Sits Idle as 95% of Capital Goes Unused
contentSnippet: This inefficiency disproportionately affects retail liquidity providers, with 50% losing money due to impermanent loss, and net deficits exceeding $60 million, a new report finds.

title: Europe Will Get Risky 3x Leveraged Bitcoin, Ethereum ETFs as Crypto Markets Melt Down
contentSnippet: Investors in Europe can soon take a gamble on 3x leveraged Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs thanks to LeverageShares.

title: Coinbase 'Negative Premium' at Widest Level since Q1, Signalling Weak U.S. Demand
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is on track for its worst weekly performance since March, while U.S. demand indicators weaken as the Coinbase premium declines and spot ETFs reach a record volume.

title: UK Crime Network, Worth Billions, Used Crypto to Funnel Drug Cash to Russia, NCA Says
contentSnippet: A billion-pound laundering network spread across the UK used cryptocurrency to move criminal proceeds and help Russian interests evade sanctions, according to the NCA.

title: Aerodrome Finance Hit by 'Front-End' Attack, Users Urged to Avoid Main Domain
contentSnippet: The attack did not compromise the underlying smart contracts, but users are advised to avoid the compromised domains and instead use decentralized ENS domains.

title: Turning ‘$11K to Half a Billion Dollars From Trading Memecoins’: Tales From a Crypto Wealth Manager
contentSnippet: The chief of crypto-focused multi-family office Digital Ascension Group talks about his VIP services for wealthy holders of digital assets.

title: Bitcoin Treasuries to Move Beyond HODL to Yield, Hedging and Share Buybacks as NAV Discount Bites
contentSnippet: As the bitcoin treasury frenzy fades, the HODL pitch isn't completely dead, but firm should consider active reserve management to stand out, analysts say.

title: Bitcoin Greed & Fear Index Shows Extreme Pessimism, Tactical Bottom May Be Near: Analyst
contentSnippet: Peak fear suggests a tactical low may be near.

title: Cardano Network Disrupted by 'Poisoned' Transaction Attack

title: Coinbase Derivatives to expand 24/7 futures trading for bevy of altcoins including ADA, AVAX, DOGE and SHIB
contentSnippet: Coinbase's CFTC-regulated derivatives arm plans to launch 24/7 trading and "perp-style" futures for nearly a dozen altcoins.

title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Hits the Jackpot, Winning $266K BTC Reward
contentSnippet: A solo miner earned a Bitcoin bounty for mining the network’s 924,569th block, securing $266,000 worth of the asset against incredible odds.

title: Grayscale’s Dogecoin and XRP ETFs tee up to launch on Monday following NYSE approvals
contentSnippet: The NYSE Arca has approved the listings for Grayscale’s Dogecoin and XRP ETFs, clearing the way for both products to launch on Monday.

title: Solo bitcoin miner beats 1-in-180-million odds to land $265,000 block
contentSnippet: A Solo CKpool miner contributing approximately 0.0000007% of the total Bitcoin network hashpower discovered a block on Friday.

title: Crypto Industry Makes Tax Policy Push With Private Dinner for Lawmakers
contentSnippet: A powerful nonprofit hosted a dinner with lawmakers this week focused on crypto taxes, while groups backing the nonprofit pushed the Trump administration on related policies.

title: Bitcoin in a Death Cross: How Low Will We Go?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is falling, dragging nearly every other crypto asset along with it. The charts suggest this could get uglier.

title: Tom Lee’s BitMine to begin offering annual dividend as ETH treasury mNAV dips

title: The Daily: Crypto selloff deepens, JPMorgan blames retail BTC and ETH ETF outflows, 24-hour liquidations top $2 billion, and more

title: Grayscale's DOGE, XRP ETFs to Go Live on NYSE Monday

title: ICP Breaks Major Support as Volume Spike Confirms Accelerated Downtrend

title: Cathie Wood Buys the Dip as Ark Invest Loads Up on Coinbase, BitMine and Circle Stock
contentSnippet: Cathie Wood's investment firm continues to buy the dip on crypto related equities, adding shares in Coinbase, BitMine, and Circle.

title: Nvidia's Stellar Quarter Fails to Quell Bears as AI Valuation Fears Deepen on Wall Street
contentSnippet: The chipmaker’s blockbuster earnings offered a brief reprieve, but a rapid reversal in trading cemented investor worries about the sustainability of the AI boom.

title: UK Operation to Hit Russian Sanctions Evasion Arrests 128, Seizes $32.6M in Crypto and Cash

title: Coinbase to acquire Vector.fun, the Tensor-built Solana trading platform, to advance ‘everything exchange’ vision
contentSnippet: Vector’s tech will plug into Coinbase’s DEX integration, while Tensor Labs shifts its NFT marketplace and TNSR token to Tensor Foundation.

title: ‘Conviction in Bitcoin is unwavering’: Saylor rebuts MSCI removal risk amid Strategy stock selloff

title: Crypto treasury firms buckle as crash erodes nearly half of combined market caps

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.
